resources.string: » This is the World Health Organization\'s (WHO) recommended body weight based on BMI values for adults. It is used for both men and women, age 20 or older.

• Severe Thinness (< 16 kg/m^2)
• Moderate Thinness (16 - 17 kg/m^2)
• Mild Thinness (17 - 18.5 kg/m^2)
• Normal (18.5 - 25 kg/m^2)
• Overweight (25 - 30 kg/m^2)
• Obese Class I (30 - 35 kg/m^2)
• Obese Class II (35 - 40 kg/m^2)
• Obese Class III (>40 kg/m^2)
